content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(-9.5, 24.5)
Consists of offshore pump (position -9.5, 24.5), boiler (position to be determined), and steam engine (position to be determined). The offshore pump is currently working and connected to the boiler.

### Copper plate mine at position(0, 0)
Consists of following entities
- Burner mining drill (position 0.0, 0.0) and a furnace at position (0.0, 0.0)
- Burner mining drill (position 5.0, 5.0) and a furnace at position (5.0, 5.0)

### Copper cable factory
Consists of following entities
- Assembling machine at position (to be determined) and inserter at position (to be determined) that puts into assembling machine
- Beltgroup (position to be determined) that connects the furnace at position (to be determined) to assembling machine at position (to be determined)

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when connecting entities
- Ensure that there are no obstructions in the path when attempting to connect pipes or other entities. Clear any pipe groups or other entities blocking the connection.

### Errors when using electricity groups
- Make sure to connect electricity groups to the electric network properly. Check the status of electricity groups and ensure they are plugged in.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing. Check for existing entities in the target position.

### Errors when retrying connections
- If a connection fails, check the surrounding area for any obstructions or issues that may prevent the connection from being established.
